name: What the...? REWIND THAT!
description:
In this game you can move through a small slice of time and add force to any object just by dragging away from it, as long as your energy meter (right screen edge) is high enough.

Your goal is to save all humans who would die if it wasnt for you and your awesome power to change the past!

By holding CTRL and dragging vertically you can also change the height component of the force you add to objects.

whenever you do so however the future changes and has to be simulated again (indicated by a red tint on the timeline slider). To start time again simply hit the play button in the bottom left corner.

Camera controls:

WASD                                   - Move

Middle Mouse Button - RotateCamera

LeftShift                              - IncreaseMovementSpeed

Object Manipulation:

Drag                                       - Add Force

Drag + CTRL                     - Add Vertical Force

LeftClick                             -Remove Force
